requestTimestamp.description: Date and time for the currency API request

isHistorical.description: True if the data was queried as historical data rather than the latest one

exchangeRateDate.description: Date of rate value. If historical is false then it matches timestamp

exchangeRates.description: Currency codes conversion to and rate values

totalPriceUSD.description: The total price for the reservation or ticket, including applicable taxes, shipping, etc. in USD

exchangeRateUSD.description: Rate value for conversion rate to USD
